comment: I guess You are one of hard working guy in our flat who always start prep wether it belongs to academic or any interview on time.. and we start a day before 😂. And  special Thanks from our side (Tomar , likhith, me , chaitanya) to help at last day of prep..
name: Abhishek Jaiswal

comment: Mera pehla IITI ka contact, first two years ka academic sahaara, bhai ab chill karna bhot hogya mehnat
name: Likhith Raj DV

comment: One of my few friends that I enjoy talking to. Study (random jokes) sessions  before exams yaad rahenge saath mai! I want to adapt your good habits but still can't😅. Thanks for everything and all the best!
name: Saral Shikhar

comment: Simple soul and a hardworking human. Jab bhi jao padhte hi rehta milta tha bhai. Time table ho toh aisa. Saath me jokes maarne me kaafi maze ate the bhai. Keep smiling and all the best for the future😊.
name: Rishabh Sharma

comment: The most sincere & hardworking guy I have ever seen. Tune thoda bht to motivate kiya tha to improve my schedule per itna dedication he nhi h anyway thanks a lot for everything keep spreading positivity & Best wishes for the rest of your life.
name: Arvind Tomar

comment:
Most intelligent, gorgeous and disciplined guy of 401.
Apna schedule pura reverse me chla hai B.Tech me.
Thoda km padha kr.
Kafi motivation mila tere se, bus implement nhi kr paya😂.
ATB for future endeavours!
name: Chaitanya

comment: Always had a confusion between Arvind yadav and Aryan yadav in Online 😅 and 3 years later you are my roommate lol. You are the only morning person IK in this college. Poora 4 saal padhliya na, ab chill karna bhi shuru karo. ALL the best bhai for your future.
name: Lohith Reddy

comment: "I'm truly amazed by your simplicity and humility! 😌 Your dedication and ambition are truly inspiring. Keep it up, my friend! 👏"
name: Parth Bhore

comment: Calm guy, who has a lot to speak about though. Thanks for pushing me to read the paper. GlobalLogic ki baate bhi batate rehna.
name: Shaik Wanhar Aziz

comment: The most disciplined person I've ever seen in my life. Bros always in hurry about something but that's good. Congratulations on your placement bro. Hamesha padthe rehna😂 par maze bhi karna (thoda). Bhulna nahi bhai CEO bann ne ke baad. Thanks for helping me in clutch moments. Let's meet again bro!
name: Jayanth Kumar
